text: The Morning After is a 1986 American mystery thriller movie directed by Sidney Lumet and starring Jane Fonda in her Oscar nominated role, Jeff Bridges, Raul Julia, Kathy Bates, Diane Salinger, Kathleen Wilhoite. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 mystery movies Category:1986 thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lumet
title: The Morning After (1986 movie)
